text:
And in other news Bette Davis's crazy daughter claims that her mother was a witch and performed spells and satanic acts.

I know that Mariah is a wack-a-doddle diva but I doubt that her sister's claims have much, if any, truth to them.
title: Mariah Carey's Sister Claims Their Mother Is Leader Of Satanic Cult

meta_data.description: I remember Mariah mentioning her mom was into the occult & and new age way back when she was with Tommy Matola. I feel this is the next floodgate to open after the Hollywood sex scandal. There are ...
